title: Drawing, "Landscape with a Lake", ca. 1890
medium: Brush and  watercolor, three borders ruled in graphite on off-white wove paper.
signed: Signed in ? and brown watercolor, lower left:  A.  W.  BRUNNER
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Arnold W. Brunner
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Arnold W. Brunner
description: View, from grassy shore in the foreground, of a lake with trees and dense foliage on far shore, and  low hills in the background.  Partly cloudy blue sky above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape with a Lake", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Brush and  watercolor, three borders ruled in graphite on off-white wove paper.. Gift of Mrs. Arnold W. Brunner. 1948-47-19.
